Hey, I have a question about running the Verus daemon. How can I ensure that it continues running even after I close my SSH terminal window?

**AI Assistant:**
To ensure that your Verus daemon continues running even after you close your SSH terminal window, you can use the `screen` command. First, install `screen` and then launch it with the command `screen`. This will start a new terminal inside your SSH session that you can reattach to later. You can then launch the Verus daemon with the command `./verus-cli/verusd -mint` and safely close your SSH terminal window. When you return to check on it later, you can reattach to the screen with the command `screen -r`.
